_documentation.auto_commit: Automatically commit at natural boundaries (phases, components)
_documentation.auto_push: Push to remote after commits (disable for offline work)
_documentation.push_on_checkpoint: Push on session checkpoints (can be frequent, disabled by default)
_documentation.max_retry_attempts: Number of retries for git operations
_documentation.retry_delay_seconds: Base delay between retries (exponential backoff applied)
_documentation.include_checkpoint_state: Include checkpoint JSON files in commits
_documentation.commit_message_prefix: Prefix for WIP commits (wip:, chore:, etc.)
